Models Module¶

class models.Customer(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Represents a customer in the e-commerce system.

id¶

Primary key.

Type:

int

full_name¶

Full name of the customer.

Type:

str

username¶

Unique username for login.

Type:

str

password¶

Hashed password for authentication.

Type:

str

age¶

Age of the customer.

Type:

int

address¶

Address of the customer.

Type:

str

gender¶

Gender of the customer.

Type:

str

marital_status¶

Marital status of the customer.

Type:

str

wallet_balance¶

Current wallet balance of the customer.

Type:

float

is_admin¶

Flag indicating if the customer has administrative privileges.

Type:

bool

__init__(**kwargs)¶

A simple constructor that allows initialization from kwargs.

Sets attributes on the constructed instance using the names and values in kwargs.

Only keys that are present as attributes of the instance’s class are allowed. These could be, for example, any mapped columns or relationships.

A SQLAlchemy query for a model. Equivalent to db.session.query(Model). Can be customized per-model by overriding query_class.

Warning

The query interface is considered legacy in SQLAlchemy. Prefer using session.execute(select()) instead.

class models.Goods(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Represents a goods item in the e-commerce system.

id¶

Primary key.

Type:

int

name¶

Name of the goods.

Type:

str

category¶

Category of the goods (e.g., food, clothes).

Type:

str

price_per_item¶

Price per individual item.

Type:

float

description¶

Description of the goods.

Type:

str

count_in_stock¶

Number of items available in stock.

Type:

int

class models.Purchase(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Represents a purchase made by a customer.

id¶

Primary key.

Type:

int

customer_id¶

Foreign key referencing the Customer.

Type:

int

goods_id¶

Foreign key referencing the Goods.

Type:

int

quantity¶

Quantity of goods purchased.

Type:

int

total_price¶

Total price for the purchase.

Type:

float

purchase_date¶

Date and time when the purchase was made.

Type:

datetime

customer¶

Relationship to the Customer.

Type:

Customer

goods¶

Relationship to the Goods.

Type:

Goods

class models.Review(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: Model

Represents a review submitted by a customer for a goods item.

id¶

Primary key.

Type:

int

customer_id¶

Foreign key referencing the Customer.

Type:

int

goods_id¶

Foreign key referencing the Goods.

Type:

int

rating¶

Rating given to the goods (1-5).

Type:

int

comment¶

Review comment.

Type:

str

created_at¶

Date and time when the review was created.

Type:

datetime

is_moderated¶

Flag indicating if the review has been moderated.

Type:

bool

customer¶

Relationship to the Customer.

Type:

Customer

goods¶

Relationship to the Goods.

Type:

Goods
